column5: Hey, I was hoping to hit the niagara bar and promised myself that id go to the bar before november. So, does anybody know a launch on the canadian side where I can launch which is close to the niagara bar lower niagara etc thanks!
There's a launch at the Queenston area.
That's where I launched last weekend for bass/pike etc....was hoping closer to the bar at the lake if possible....might not be possible though
That is the only Canadian launch open to the public in that area. All launches in NOTL are private.
HTHM is 100% correct Queenston is the only launch U have to be a member of the yaught Club in NOTL to launch there  It's not that far of a run I do it regularly in my 14 footer Takes me 15 mins max

Looking at the map, I used to fish the bar area and launch at St. Catharines Marina at Port Weller, the distance looks about the same. We used to downrig for staging fish just outside the dropoff. Watch the border marker in that area.
